item.title: Migrating from Pelican to Wordpress
item.description: I’ve migrated my main blog from Pelican to Wordpress. (Pelican is a static blog generator.) The main reason for changing is that I to make some changes in my webpage layout, or add some feature like a landing page, but don’t want to make (program) all the changes myself. Using Wordpress will add complexity to my publishing workflow, but things like implementing landing pages and writing custom page archives can be quickly done in Wordpress by using the appropriate plugin.

item.title: Shawn Blanc interviews John Gruber
item.description: This is interview is from 2008, by I’ve just re-read it and thought it was worth linking for my future reference: John Gruber: A Mix of the Technical, the Artful, the Thoughtful, and the Absurd.
